Action.label: Split time to hours and minutes

Vals.com.twofortyfouram.locale.intent.extra.B: Deletes an alarm whose name is given as the variable %wmualarmname. It will delete the first alarm it finds with this name. Please, make sure the name is unique.
Creates an alarm using the variables: %wmualarmname as the label (optionnal), %wmualarmhour as the hour, %wmualarmminute as the minutes, %wmualarmampm as am/pm (optionnal).

Action.label: Set alarm time global for Profiles

Lights on to 100% 10 second fade for 'Lamp Color'
Lights on to 50% 1 second fade for 'Lamp Color'
Lights on to 0% 1 second fade for 'Lamp Color'

today is free AND tomorrow is free
today is free AND tomorrow is work
today is work AND tomorrow is work

<StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%ctevids() Event id list </_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1>%ctoccurrenceids() Occurrence identifier list -1 for non recurring events, valid otherwise</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2>%ctorgs() Email event owner list </_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3>%cttitles() Title list </_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES4>%ctdescs() Description list </_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES4><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES5>%ctstarts() Start time list </_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES5><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES6>%ctends() End time list </_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES6><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES7>%ctlocations() Location list </_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES7><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES8>%cttimezones() Timezone list </_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES8><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES9>%ctcolors() Events colors in hex format </_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES9><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES10>%ctendtimezones() End timezone list </_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES10><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES11>%ctalldays() All day list True if all day event, false otherwise</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES11><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES12>%ctattendeeemails() Attendees email list List of list separated by semicolon</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES12><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES13>%ctattendeenames() Attendees name list List of list separated by </_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES15><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES16>%ctremmethods() List of reminder methods Values are: ALERT, DEFAULT, SMS, EMAIL, ALARM</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES16><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES17>%ctremminutes() List of reminder minutes </_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES17></StringArray>
